metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15019 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low.
metadata.Description:
LAME 3.99.5 has a NULL Pointer Dereference in the hip_decode_init function within libmp3lame/mpglib_interface.c via a malformed mpg file, because of an incorrect calloc call.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-15019` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

lame - 3.100-2
libmp3lame0 - 3.100-2
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: lame package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.100-2').
